mapper.select: select a.* from v2_saas_users a inner join v2_saas_user_comms b on a.id = b.saas_user_id inner join comms c on b.comm_id = c.id inner join v2_saas_user_roles d on a.id = d.saas_user_id inner join v2_saas_roles e on d.saas_role_id = e.id where c.comm_code = #{commCode} and e.name = 'admin' order by a.created_at desc limit 1;
